items.question: Is SVM-Pay really free to use?
items.answer: Yes, SVM-Pay charges no additional fees beyond the standard network transaction fees required by the blockchain networks themselves.

items.question: Which networks does SVM-Pay support?
items.answer: SVM-Pay supports Solana, Sonic SVM, Eclipse, and s00n networks, with more being added regularly.

items.question: How easy is it to integrate SVM-Pay?
items.answer: SVM-Pay is designed for one-click integration. Most developers can integrate it into their applications in under an hour with just a few lines of code.

items.question: Is SVM-Pay secure?
items.answer: Yes, SVM-Pay is built with security best practices for blockchain payments, ensuring your transactions are safe and reliable.

items.question: Can I use SVM-Pay for my business?
items.answer: Absolutely! SVM-Pay is designed for businesses of all sizes, from individual developers to large enterprises.
